Bluetooth technology is built into this vehicle, keeping your hands on the steering wheel and your focus on the road. messaging, and access to your favorite apps.Blind Spot Monitor: Stay aware of vehicles in your blind spots, enhancing safety during lane changes.Lane Keep Assist with Lane Departure Warning: Receive alerts and gentle steering corrections to help you stay centered within your lane.10 Touchscreen Display: Enjoy an intuitive interface for navigation, entertainment, and vehicle settings.Bluetooth Phone Connectivity and Streaming Audio: Stay connected while on the go, making calls and streaming music wirelessly.Remote Engine Start: Precondition your Compass by starting the engine remotely, ensuring a comfortable cabin temperature.Remote Keyless Entry: Easily lock and unlock your vehicle without removing the key fob from your pocket.Smartphone Integration: Sync your phone seamlessly with Automatic Headlights: Automatically adjust brightness based on ambient conditions.Traction Control: Maintain stability and grip during acceleration and cornering.The 2024 Jeep Compass Latitude name: 2024 Jeep Compass Limited
description: Introducing the 2024 Jeep Compass Limited, a sophisticated and capable SUV that seamlessly combines advanced technology, comfort, and performance. Finished in a striking Diamond Black Crystal Pearlcoat, this 4x4 powerhouse is designed to elevate your driving experience.### Striking ExteriorThe Compass Limited stands out with its sleek design and Wheels: 18 x 7 Painted Diamond Cut Aluminum. The subtle yet distinctive features, like the roof rack and body-colored bumpers, add to its aesthetic appeal.### Luxurious InteriorStep into luxury with the Compass Limited's interior, featuring heated front leather seats and a panoramic sunroof that invites the outdoors in. The Leatherette Seats and 8-way power driver seat contribute to a comfortable and customizable driving experience.### Advanced TechnologyStay connected and informed with the 10.1 touchscreen display, equipped with navigation/GPS and integrated Apple CarPlay and Google Android Auto. The Alpine Premium Audio system ensures a premium auditory experience, while the built-in WiFi hotspot keeps you connected on the go.### Safety FirstSafety is a top priority with the Compass Limited. The ParkView Rear Back-Up Camera, Front and Rear Park Assist, Blind Spot Monitor, and Rear Cross-Traffic Alert provide enhanced awareness and assistance for a confident driving experience.### Intelligent PerformancePowered by a robust 2.0L I4 DOHC engine and 4WD capability, the Compass Limited offers a responsive and efficient driving experience. The 3.73 Final Drive Ratio ensures optimal performance across various terrains.### Smart ConvenienceConvenience is at your fingertips with features like remote engine start, remote keyless entry, and the SiriusXM Guardian system. The leather-wrapped steering wheel and leather shift knob add a touch of sophistication to the cabin.### Additional FeaturesOther notable features include Active Cruise Control, Auto High-beam Headlights, Rain Sensing Wipers, and a Global Telematics Box Module (TBM) for enhanced connectivity.### ConclusionThe 2024 Jeep Compass Limited delivers a well-rounded driving experience, balancing style, comfort, and technology. Whether navigating city streets or venturing off the beaten path, the Compass Limited is equipped to handle it all. Elevate your journeys with the perfect blend of sophistication and capability.### Specifications:- Exterior: Diamond Black Crystal Pearlcoat- Interior: Black Leatherette- Engine: 2.0L I4 DOHC- Drive: 4WD- Transmission: AutomaticDiscover the extraordinary with the 2024 Jeep Compass Limited where luxury meets capability. Price includes: $500 - 2024 DJR National Retail Consumer Cash 24CR1. Exp.

Spacious Interior: Despite its sporty exterior, the Atlas Cross Sport offers generous interior space, comfortably seating five passengers with ample headroom and legroom in both rows. , 3. Advanced Technology: Equipped with Volkswagen's latest infotainment system, the Atlas Cross Sport features a user-friendly touchscreen interface with available smartphone integration, navigation, and premium audio systems for enhanced entertainment on the go. , 4. Dynamic Performance: With a turbocharged engine and available all-wheel drive, the Atlas Cross Sport delivers responsive acceleration, agile handling, and confident performance, whether navigating city streets or venturing off the beaten path. , 5. Versatility: The Atlas Cross Sport offers versatile cargo space, with the ability to fold down the rear seats to accommodate larger items, making it ideal for transporting gear, luggage, or groceries with ease. , 6. Safety Features: Volkswagen prioritizes safety, and the Atlas Cross Sport offers a comprehensive suite of available advanced safety features and driver-assist technologies, including forward collision warning, automatic emergency braking, blind-spot monitoring, and more, to help keep you and your passengers safe on the road. , Sale price excludes sales tax, licensing, and $200 negotiable dealer documentation fees. description: Unleash Your Adventure: 2024 Jeep Compass Latitude 4WDEmbark on a journey of exploration with the 2024 Jeep Compass Latitude, a perfect blend of style, technology, and capability. This 4D Sport Utility, equipped with 4x4 prowess, ensures that every drive is an opportunity for discovery.Key Features:- 4x4/Four-Wheel Drive: Experience superior traction and control on any Collision Alert: Receive warnings for potential front-end collisions.- 10 Touchscreen Display: Command your vehicle with a vibrant and intuitive interface.- Bluetooth Phone Connectivity and Streaming Audio: Stay connected hands-free.- Remote Engine Start and Remote Keyless Entry: Convenient features for your busy lifestyle.- Smartphone Integration: Enhance your driving experience with seamless connectivity.Altitude Special Edition:- Black Day Light Opening Moldings and Roof: Elevate your Compass's style with a sleek and distinctive look.- Gloss Black Surround/Neutral Gray Rings: A refined touch to the exterior.- Light Tungsten Interior Accent Stitching: Enhances the interior with attention to detail.- Neutral Gray Exterior Badging: Adds a touch of sophistication.- Piano Black Interior Accents: Stylish and modern interior details.- Wheels: 18 x 7 Gloss Black Painted Aluminum: Stylish and functional wheels that complement the overall design.Additional Highlights:- 17 x 7 Aluminum Wheels: A perfect balance of style and performance.- ParkView Rear Back-Up Camera: Enhanced visibility for confident parking.- Premium Cloth/Vinyl Bucket Seats: Comfortable and stylish interior seating.- Roof Rack: Rails Only: Ready for your adventure gear.Performance and Efficiency:- 3.73 Final Drive Ratio: Optimal balance of power and efficiency.- Four-Wheel Disc Brakes: Responsive braking for enhanced safety.- Fuel-Efficient Powertrain: Balance performance with fuel efficiency.Technology and Connectivity:- Uconnect 5 with 10.1 Display: Cutting-edge infotainment system.- Emergency Communication System: SiriusXM Guardian: Added safety and security.- Variably Intermittent Wipers: Adjust to the pace of changing weather conditions.The 2024 Jeep Compass Latitude 4WD is not just a vehicle; it's a companion for your adventurous spirit.

name: 2024 Nissan Kicks SR
description:
Vehicle DetailsLooking for a stylish and reliable vehicle? Look no further than this 2024 Nissan Kicks SR with FWD and a powerful L4, 1.6L engine.   This sleek and sporty SUV is packed with features to enhance your driving experience, including XM Radio, Leather Seats, Hands Free Bluetooth, Android Auto, and a Heated Steering Wheel. Whether you're cruising around town or hitting the highway for a road trip, this Nissan Kicks SR has everything you need to stay comfortable and connected on the go.  With its eye-catching design and cutting-edge technology, this 2024 Nissan Kicks SR is sure to turn heads wherever you go. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own this fantastic vehicle - visit our dealership today to take it for a test drive and see for yourself why the Nissan Kicks SR is the perfect choice for your next adventure.EquipmentThe vehicle keeps you comfortable with Auto Climate. Engulf yourself with the crystal clear sound of a BOSE sound system in this model.  This Nissan Kicks comes equipped with Android Auto for seamless smartphone integration on the road. The Nissan Kicks has automated speed control that adjusts to maintain a safe following distance, enhancing highway driving convenience. The rear parking assist technology on this small suv will put you at ease when reversing.  The system alerts you as you get closer to an obstruction. This small suv features a hands-free Bluetooth phone system. Keep your hands warm all winter with a heated steering wheel in  this 2024 Nissan Kicks  . Protect this vehicle from unwanted accidents with a cutting edge backup camera system. This unit offers Apple CarPlay for seamless connectivity. This unit's Lane Departure Warning helps keep you in your lane. The leather seats in this 2024 Nissan Kicks  are a must for buyers looking for comfort, durability, and style.PackagesSR Premium Package: Bose Personal Plus Audio System; Heated Front Seats; Prima-Tex Appointed Seat Trim; Security System; Tonneau Cover; Heated Steering Wheel. 17'' Black Alloy Wheels. Special Paint - Scarlet Ember Tintcoat. Splash Guards Grain (4 Piece). Carpeted Floor Mats with Cargo Mat. Equipment listed is based on original vehicle build and subject to change. Please confirm the accuracy of the included equipment by calling the dealer prior to purchase.Additional InformationWe understand car buying can be very stressful and take way too long! name: 2024 Nissan Kicks SR
description:
Vehicle DetailsIntroducing the 2024 Nissan Kicks SR, a sleek and stylish compact SUV that is sure to turn heads on the road. Powered by a fuel-efficient L4, 1.6L engine, this vehicle offers a smooth and responsive driving experience with its front-wheel drive system.   The 2024 Nissan Kicks SR comes equipped with a range of advanced features to enhance convenience and safety. Stay connected on the go with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility, allowing you to easily access your favorite apps and music through the vehicle's infotainment system. The Lane Departure Warning system helps to keep you safe on the road by alerting you if you unintentionally drift out of your lane, while the back-up camera provides added visibility when reversing.  Step inside the cabin of the 2024 Nissan Kicks SR and enjoy the comfort of automatic climate control, ensuring that you and your passengers stay comfortable no matter the weather outside. With its modern design, cutting-edge technology, and impressive performance, the 2024 Nissan Kicks SR is the perfect choice for those seeking a stylish and practical compact SUV. Visit our dealership today to experience the 2024 Nissan Kicks SR for yourself.EquipmentThis model offers Automatic Climate Control for personalized comfort. The vehicle has auto-adjust speed for safe following. Bluetooth technology is built into this small suv, keeping your hands on the steering wheel and your focus on the road. It's Lane Departure Warning keeps you safe by alerting you when you drift from your lane. This small suv is equipped with the latest generation of XM/Sirius Radio. The Nissan Kicks comes equipped with Android Auto for seamless smartphone integration on the road. The rear parking assist technology on this vehicle will put you at ease when reversing. name: 2023 Jeep Gladiator Rubicon
description: Summary:  Home of the Limited Lifetime Powertrain Warranty  Vehicle Details: Introducing the highly anticipated 2023 Jeep Gladiator Rubicon, a rugged and versatile vehicle that combines the iconic Jeep design with unparalleled off-road capabilities. This all-new model is equipped with a powerful V6, 3.6L engine, providing exceptional performance on and off the beaten path. Designed to conquer any terrain, the Gladiator Rubicon features a robust 4WD system that ensures superior traction and stability, enabling you to confidently navigate through challenging landscapes. Whether you're embarking on an adventurous weekend getaway or tackling daily commutes, this vehicle is ready to tackle any journey with ease. Step inside the luxurious cabin and experience the comfort and sophistication that the Gladiator Rubicon offers. Sink into the premium leather seats, meticulously crafted to provide optimal support during long drives. Stay connected and entertained with the advanced Android Auto integration, allowing seamless access to your favorite applications and music playlists. The integrated navigation system ensures you never lose your way, providing turn-by-turn directions to your desired destination. Safety is paramount, and the Gladiator Rubicon is equipped with a cutting-edge back-up camera that provides a clear view of your surroundings, enhancing maneuverability and reducing blind spots. Additionally, the convenient remote start feature allows you to warm up or cool down the vehicle before stepping inside, ensuring optimum comfort in all weather conditions. With its remarkable combination of power, luxury, and advanced technology, the 2023 Jeep Gladiator Rubicon is the perfect companion for those seeking both adventure and refinement. Visit our dealership today and experience the unparalleled excellence of this remarkable vehicle firsthand. Equipment: Bluetooth technology is built into the vehicle, keeping your hands on the steering wheel and your focus on the road. This Jeep Gladiator is equipped with the latest generation of XM/Sirius Radio. Protect the vehicle from unwanted accidents with a cutting edge backup camera system. This model offers Android Auto for seamless smartphone integration. It keeps you comfortable with Auto Climate. The installed navigation system will keep you on the right path. This unit offers Apple CarPlay for seamless connectivity. This Jeep Gladiator is pure luxury with a heated steering wheel. Never get into a cold vehicle again with the remote start feature on the vehicle. The leather seats in this unit are a must for buyers looking for comfort, durability, and style.

description:

Perfect for city driving and weekend adventures, this vehicle is sure to impress.  Stay connected on the go with Hands-Free Bluetooth, Apple CarPlay, and Android Auto, allowing you to easily access your favorite apps and music. Stay safe on the road with Lane Departure Warning and a Back-Up Camera, giving you added peace of mind.  With its sleek design and spacious interior, this Nissan Kicks S is the perfect blend of style and functionality. Whether you're running errands around town or heading out on a road trip, this vehicle is up for the challenge.  Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a top-rated SUV at an unbeatable price. Visit our dealership today to test drive this 2024 Nissan Kicks S and experience the ultimate driving experience for yourself.EquipmentThe rear parking assist technology on this vehicle will put you at ease when reversing.  The system alerts you as you get closer to an obstruction. Apple CarPlay: Seamless smartphone integration for this unit - stay connected and entertained on the go! See what's behind you with the back up camera on it. Bluetooth technology is built into it, keeping your hands on the steering wheel and your focus on the road. This unit's Lane Departure Warning keeps you safe by alerting you when you drift from your lane. The vehicle offers Android Auto for seamless smartphone integration. This small suv projects refinement with a racy metallic gray exterior. This small suv is front wheel drive. It has a L4, 1.6L high output engine. Maintaining a stable interior temperature in this small suv is easy with the climate control system. This unit is equipped with a gasoline engine. name: 2023 Jeep Gladiator Rubicon
description: Summary:  Home of the Limited Lifetime Powertrain Warranty  Vehicle Details: Introducing the highly anticipated 2023 Jeep Gladiator Rubicon, the ultimate off-roading powerhouse that sets the bar high for adventure seekers. This rugged beast is equipped with a commanding V6, 3.6L engine, delivering an exhilarating performance that leaves no terrain unconquered. The 2023 Jeep Gladiator Rubicon comes fully loaded with a plethora of cutting-edge features, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable driving experience. Stay connected and entertained on the go with the inclusion of Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility, allowing you to effortlessly integrate your smartphone and access your favorite apps, navigation, and media with ease. Additionally, the XM Radio feature offers an extensive range of music, news, and entertainment options to enhance every drive. Designed to tackle the most challenging landscapes, the 2023 Jeep Gladiator Rubicon boasts a comprehensive Off-Road Package that equips it with a host of enhancements. This includes heavy-duty suspension, all-terrain tires, rock rails, and an electronic disconnecting sway bar, enabling you to traverse through rugged terrains with unrivaled confidence. Experience unparalleled comfort even in the harshest conditions with the available heated steering wheel, ensuring warmth and convenience during colder climates. With its 4WD capability, the Jeep Gladiator Rubicon is equipped to handle any weather condition or challenging road surface, providing you with the utmost control and stability. With its robust performance, cutting-edge features, and unwavering capability, the 2023 Jeep Gladiator Rubicon is the ultimate choice for those seeking thrilling adventures both on and off the road. Don't miss your chance to own this exceptional vehicle that sets a new standard in the world of off-roading. Equipment: This unit offers Apple CarPlay for seamless connectivity. This 2023 Jeep Gladiator keeps you comfortable with Auto Climate. This unit features a hands-free Bluetooth phone system. The leather seats in it are a must for buyers looking for comfort, durability, and style. with XM/Sirus Satellite Radio you are no longer restricted by poor quality local radio stations while driving this unit. Anywhere on the planet, you will have hundreds of digital stations to choose from. This model is pure luxury with a heated steering wheel. Never get into a cold vehicle again with the remote start feature on this vehicle. The Jeep Gladiator comes equipped with Android Auto for seamless smartphone integration on the road. An off-road package is installed on this model so you are ready for your four-wheeling best.

name: 2024 Ford Edge SEL
description: Vehicle DetailsIntroducing the 2024 Ford Edge SEL AWD  a masterful blend of performance, luxury, and cutting-edge technology, designed to elevate your driving experience to new heights. Under the hood, you'll find the robust L4, 2.0L engine, delivering a perfect balance of power and efficiency, making every drive a thrill.The Ford Edge SEL comes equipped with All-Wheel Drive, ensuring optimal traction and control in all weather conditions. Whether you're navigating city streets or tackling rugged terrain, this SUV is built to handle it all with confidence and ease.Step inside and indulge in the sheer luxury of leather seats, designed for ultimate comfort and style. The automatic climate control system ensures you and your passengers always enjoy the perfect temperature, no matter the season. Convenience is at your fingertips with the remote start feature, allowing you to warm up or cool down your vehicle before you even step inside.Stay connected and entertained with Apple CarPlay, seamlessly integrating your iPhone with the vehicle's infotainment system. Plus, the rear parking sensors provide an added layer of safety, making parking in tight spots a breeze.The 2024 Ford Edge SEL AWD is not just a vehicle; it's a statement of sophistication and performance. Don't miss your chance to experience the pinnacle of modern driving  visit your local Ford dealership today!EquipmentThe Ford Edge keeps you comfortable with Auto Climate. This vehicle's Cross-Traffic Alert: Safeguarding you from unexpected traffic when reversing. The leather seats in this model are a must for buyers looking for comfort, durability, and style. Protect this vehicle from unwanted accidents with a cutting edge backup camera system. This vehicle comes equipped with Android Auto for seamless smartphone integration on the road. It offers Apple CarPlay for seamless connectivity. The rear parking assist technology on this mid-size suv will put you at ease when reversing. The system alerts you as you get closer to an obstruction. Never get into a cold vehicle again with the remote start feature on this mid-size suv. Bluetooth technology is built into this unit, keeping your hands on the steering wheel and your focus on the road. The vehicle has a L4, 2.0L high output engine. Set the temperature exactly where you are most comfortable in this model.

name: 2024 Jeep Compass Latitude
description:
Convenience Group, Heated Seats, Heated Steering Wheel, Remote Start, Power Liftgate, A formidable presence, our 2024 Jeep Compass Latitude 4X4 with the Convenience Pack is a fearless adventure machine in Bright White w/ Black Two-Tone! Powered by a TurboCharged 2.0 Liter 4 Cylinder providing 200hp to an 8 Speed Automatic transmission for mastering the miles with brawny confidence. A standard Selec-Terrain system helps you go from town to trail without worry about traction, and this Four Wheel Drive SUV achieves nearly 32mpg on the highway. An eye-catching grille adds a touch of flash to our Compass, which shows off LED lighting, fog lamps, roof rails, alloy wheels, rugged body cladding, and our Convenience Pack`s hands-free liftgate. Our Latitude cabin has our Convenience Pack to add smart features like heated premium cloth front seats, a heated-wrapped steering wheel, dual-zone automatic climate control, remote start, and rear USB ports. The easy-to-use infotainment system bundles a 10.1-inch touchscreen, a 7-inch driver display, Android Auto®/Apple CarPlay®, WiFi compatibility, voice recognition, Bluetooth®, and six-speaker audio. Jeep helps safeguard your journeys with automatic braking, active lane management, blind-spot monitoring, hill-start assist, a rearview camera, forward collision warning, a driver attention monitor, tire-pressure monitoring, and other sophisticated technologies. You can find your way to better driving with our Compass Latitude! Save this Page and Call for Availability. We Know You Will Enjoy Your Test Drive Towards Ownership!

Vehicle Details: Introducing the 2024 Dodge Hornet R/T, a pinnacle of performance and style. This brand-new vehicle, with only 5 miles on the odometer, is ready to conquer any road with its exceptional features and cutting-edge technology. Equipped with an impressive AWD system, this beast ensures optimum traction and stability, providing an unrivaled driving experience. Under the hood, the 2024 Dodge Hornet R/T boasts a powerful L4, 1.3L engine, delivering a perfect blend of efficiency and exhilaration. Whether you're cruising through city streets or embarking on an adventure, this vehicle offers a responsive and dynamic ride, making every journey a thrilling one. Step inside the cabin, and you'll find a wealth of advanced amenities designed to enhance your driving pleasure. The inclusion of XM Radio allows you to enjoy an extensive range of entertainment options, while the Android Auto feature ensures seamless integration with your smartphone for hands-free connectivity and access to your favorite apps. Safety is paramount, and the 2024 Dodge Hornet R/T comes equipped with an array of innovative safety features. The Adaptive Cruise Control system automatically adjusts your speed to maintain a safe distance from the vehicle ahead, while the Forward Collision Warning alerts you of potential hazards on the road. With Hands-Free Bluetooth, you can effortlessly make and receive calls, keeping your focus on the road ahead. Experience the thrill of driving the 2024 Dodge Hornet R/T at our dealership. With its exceptional performance, cutting-edge technology, and top-notch safety features, this vehicle is an absolute game-changer. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own this remarkable car that combines power, style, and innovation.
